# zitadel_user_grant (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_id` (String) ID of the organization which owns the resource
- `project_id` (String) ID of the project
- `role_keys` (Set of String) List of roles granted
